c74object.name: abc.trajectories~
c74object.description: abc.trajectories~ 2D trajectories in cartesian coordinates. mode square stands for a square, mode Z for a Z, mode squareZ for an interpolation between a square and a Z, mode random for a random trajectory. All of them have in common two controllers: freq (frequency of the shape in s-1), and size.

attribute.name: mode
attribute.description: sets the mode of trajectories. Possible values: 'square', 'Z', 'squareZ', 'random'.
attribute.digest: sets the mode of reverberation (stereo or quadri)

method.name: revDur
method.description: sets the duration of reverberation with values between 0 and 127: 127 means an 'infinite' duration. [init=120:min=0:max=127:step=1].
method.digest: sets the duration of reverberation with values between 0 and 127

method.name: revGain
method.description: sets gain of the reverberate signal. [init=100:min=0:max=127:step=1].
method.digest: sets gain of the reverberate signal
